title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 14 January 2013 - XWiki
content:
<Enygma`> has quit  
00:37 <SvenDowideit> has quit  
00:39 <polx> has quit  
00:45 <vmassol> has quit  
01:28 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
01:46 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
03:03 <jvdrean> has quit  
04:03 <tekzilla> has quit  
04:05 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
06:01 <Denis2> has joined #xwiki  
06:04 <Denis> has quit  
07:24 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
08:27 <polx> has quit  
08:34 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:51 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
08:53 <polx> has quit  
08:57 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
08:59 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:13 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:24 <polx> has quit  
09:26 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
09:44 <vmassol> good morning  
09:46 <Denis2> is now known as <Denis>  
09:55 <tdelafosse> has joined #xwiki  
09:58 <vmassol> today is release day  
09:59 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
10:01 <vmassol> however we still have quite a few blockers :(  
10:03 <vmassol> we need some information on progress from mflorea, jvdrean who are working on blockers  
10:03 <mflorea> vmassol: I'm committing right now, but I have bad news..  
10:03 <mflorea> just a sec  
10:06 <vmassol> there's also Denis' issue with stability  
10:06 <vmassol> Denis: any discovery?  
10:07 <vmassol> then there's AndreasJonsson's commit that we need to review  
10:07 <vmassol> (the one from the week end)  
10:12 <Denis> vmassol: unfortunately, no, I am even doubtful that the FD issue of the attachment cache could really be the cause of crashes.  
10:19 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:25 <tmortagne> I'm still working on 2 failing repository tests, still don't understand why this field is stored as a String instead of a List but I don't seems to have the same behavior in debug mode, debugging more...  
10:38 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:54 <mflorea> vmassol: is http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-8252 planned for 4.4.1? I merged my work ( http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-8687 ) in 4.4.1 but tmortagne thinks  the rest of the fix is a bit dangerous for 4.4.1 .  
10:55 <vmassol> well sburjan` marked 4.4 as not recommended because of XWIKI-8252  
10:55 <vmassol> and we need to release a 4.4.1  
10:55 <vmassol> so if we want 4.4.1 to be recommended I guess we would need it  
10:55 <mflorea> ok  
10:56 <vmassol> I personally think the life time of 4.4.1 will be short anyway  
10:56 <mflorea> I'll leave my commit then. We'll see after tmortagne fixes XWIKI-8252 is the fix is good for 4.4.1  
10:59 <tmortagne> It's not like XWIKI-8252 was a regression so IMO it's far from blocker for 4.4.1 and what's required to finish XWIKI-8252 it too dangerous for 4.4.1 IMO (need to jingle with previous and next XAR pages as a whole so it's a big change for the XAR install)  
11:01 <mflorea> what I did for XWIKI-8687 helps a bit (reduces the number of merge conflicts) if the upgrade is from a recent version. But the number of merge conflicts is greater as the version is older (I tested with 2.7.2 and I got many merge conflicts. 3.x is probably better)  
11:01 <vmassol> tmortagne: blocker means that because of this DM cannot be used in production  
11:01 <vmassol> (it's not because of a regression)  
11:09 <GuillaumeF> has joined #xwiki  
11:24 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
11:31 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
11:52 <Inge-> has quit  
11:54 <AndreasJonsson> Should we include XWIKI-8686 (which fixes XE-539) in 4.4.1?  
11:55 <vmassol> AndreasJonsson: I don't think it's needed for 4.4.1, I don't know your fix well enough yet to judge the risk  
11:56 <vmassol> any risk?  
11:56 <vmassol> the reason I don't think it's needed is because 4.5 is going to be out real soon  
11:57 <vmassol> now if there's no risk we might as well add it but it's a call to make  
12:00 <AndreasJonsson> vmassol: I would say there is no risk with this patch.  
12:11 <sburjan> good morning everybody  
12:12 <sburjan> vmassol: I have 2 questions about the VM creation (I want to commit today ir tomorrow) I will resurrect the thread on the devlist and I'll ask my questions there  
12:15 <polx> has quit  
12:16 <sburjan> no, I see that since the repo is created with the name xwiki-enterprise-vagrant, I don't have those questions anymore. Gonna commit and sent an [ANN] e-mail :)  
12:23 <cjd> has quit  
12:24 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
12:31 <Slashman> has quit  
12:33 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
12:46 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
12:47 <mflorea> has quit  
12:55 <vmassol> extension test still failing  
12:55 <vmassol> expected:<Alice [Macro]> but was:<Alice [Wiki Macro (upgraded)]>  
12:56 <vmassol> tmortagne/mf   
12:56 <vmassol> \*mflorea  
12:57 <tmortagne> vmassol: yes that's actually a new one, working on http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-8688 and will look at it unless mflorea have the time to look at it  
12:57 <vmassol> ok  
13:09 <vmassol> jvdrean: any news on the uiextension blocking issues?  
13:15 <vmassol> guys, I'm going to put back javamelody on xwiki.org to monitor it  
13:38 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
13:38 <vmassol> would have been nice to warn us a bit ahead of me asking on the release day :)  
13:43 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
13:45 <polx> has joined #xwiki

15:45 <tmortagne> vmassol: yes you get "partially up to date" when one of the step has cancel state  
15:45 <tmortagne> cancel or skip

15:46 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki

18:52 <GuillaumeF> has quit  
19:09 <vmassol> 119s for a request on the xwiki.org home page that's a lot: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/monitoring?part=graph&graph=http7b7a98ead2acf0a87dd9ac696393e7dd9ceb8004  
19:10 <vmassol> I wonder if it's a restart that caused the delay  
19:13 <vmassol> there were 3 deviations  
19:14 <vmassol> it's interesting to see all sql requests  
19:16 <vmassol> 64 requests
